## ✅ Checklist

- [ ] Code compiles and passes unit tests
- [ ] No breaking changes introduced (or documented)
- [ ] Docs/readme updated if needed
- [ ] Follows Routya code style and conventions
- [ ] Scoped vs root resolution behavior remains correct
